Reference
=========

.. _config:

Config
------

Dictionary example

Functions
---------

This is the only interface that you should ever need to get
**user info** and **credentials** from a **provider** and to make calls to its
**protected resources**. 

.. automodule:: authomatic
   :members: login, short_name, async_fetch, fetch

Classes
-------

.. automodule:: authomatic.core
   :members: Consumer, User, Credentials, LoginResult, Request, Response, UserInfoResponse
